item.title: TV SERIES
item.description: Shannon Heights Television Inc. a Seattle based production company is seeking actors to fill casting needs for its television series Lakeside Manor. The following talants are needed is needed to complete our pilot episode and for potential roles in the longer term services: One Asian female at least age 21 to 27 to play Britta Kwon the older daughter of a minister. Britta works at Finnermans Deptment store working in the womens shoe department and has an unemployed boyfriend named Jake, One Asian female at least age 16 to 19 to play high school student Stephanie Kwon. She is Britta's younger sis. She's now getting stolen jewelry from her new boyfriend Clay. One Ethnic or African American female at least 17 and up to 20 years of age to play character Tiffany Parks who is not liking Stephanie Kwon much these days. One male character to play the role of a 16 to 17 year old high school student named Kyle Brier. Scenes will be generally shot during the weekends beginning June 15 and through July. Most of the scenes for the above roles for the high school students will be filmed at Nathan Hale High school and the role of Stephanie maybe at other locations as well.

item.title: WEDDING SHOOT
item.description:
Need a few nice and fun loving models to do a wedding shoot, we need everyone from a bride and a groom as well as a flower girl and ring bearer for a new up and coming line of wedding apparel for summer and fall.
Descriptions:
*Bride: between 21-35 with long beautiful hair and a small build. *Groom: between 24-40 with a clean cut and fresh new look *Brides maids between 19-30 need various height, weight and hair lengths *Flower girl and ring bearer between 5-12 with an adorable look and is comfortable with being in front of the camera
The shoot is going to be on June 16th with a fitting date on June 15th in order to make sure that the clothes fit properly.
In order to apply please send some photos, a short description of why you think you are good for this shoot and contact info so that I may reach you about specific things like clothing size, waist size, etc. As for compensation each person will receive $150 plus images for the shoot and be featured in a few local magazines.

item.title: ACTRESS/ACTORS
item.description:
I'm looking to cast for a dramatic short film that will begin filming in the next few weeks. Filming will take place over the span of 2-5 days, your presence will not be required on all days.
This is a low budget, independent short that will be submitted to film festivals in the Fall and Winter of this year. All performers will be credited for their contributions. Very good opportunity to gain exposure.
Again, prior experience is only preferred for the Lead Actress and not required for any of the roles offered.
ROLE 1 Actress - female, early to late 20's, some acting experience preferred but not required, the role is of an actress and love interest to our lead actor
ROLE 2 Supporting Actress - female, late 20's to mid-30's, the role is a mother waiting at a bus stop with her child, no experience required at all, this is non-speaking role
ROLE 3 Supporting Child - boy or girl, age 5-11, this is a non-speaking role, no experience required
Auditions will be held in Seattle on June 8th. More information about location and time will be given to those who submit their info.
Email 2 head shots and contact information as well as basic info (name, age).
Pay will be discussed with each individual with an assigned role.
